span.a: District Facilities Closed Until Further Notice
District Facilities Closed Until Further Notice
District Facilities Closed Until Further Notice
District Facilities Closed Until Further Notice
District Facilities Closed Until Further Notice

a.span: Duncanville ISD Facilities Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 School Year; Learning At Home Continues

div.p: As a result of today’s announcement by Texas Governor Greg Abbott, Duncanville ISD facilities and offices will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

a.title: Go to comments for Duncanville ISD Facilities Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 School Year; Learning At Home Continues

a.span: Former Pantherette Named to Naismith Hall of Fame

div.p: On Saturday, April 4, former Duncanville Pantherette Tamika Catchings was officially elected to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame as a member of the Class of 2020.

a.title: Go to comments for Former Pantherette Named to Naismith Hall of Fame

div.p: Hello, Duncanville ISD family. I hope you and your loved ones are staying safe and staying strong for one another while practicing social distancing.

a.title: Go to comments for Superintendent Weekly Wrap Up

img.alt: Panther Prints Photographer Takes Top State Honor

a.span: Panther Prints Photographer Takes Top State Honor

div.p: Duncanville High School senior Emily Cruz received the highest honor in this year’s Texas Association of Journalism Educators photo competition.

a.title: Go to comments for Panther Prints Photographer Takes Top State Honor

div.p: This is the Superintendent Weekly Wrap Up where I’ll share just a few of the highlights from the past week.
